text: Hugues Quiéret was a French naval commander who played a major role at the Battle of Sluys. Casimir de Sars de Solmon, Recueil de généalogies, fragments, notes et épitaphes des provinces du Nord, volume 9, p.19-22 : généalogie Quieret, volume 10, p.165-171 : généalogie Tramecourt (n°03). ==References== Category:1290 births Category:1340 deaths Category:French military people Category:Hundred Years' War
title: Hugues Quiéret
